name: Swinging to the Rhythm
description:
This is my submission to the 2021 GMTK Jam! In the jam, everyone was tasked with making a game following the theme "Joined Together" under a 48 hour timeframe.

My submission is a minigolf game, where connected rooms do not join as you expect, creating an unusual experience.

Controls: CursorAimSpaceShootRight ClickView ScoreboardJReset Ball Note:

There is a bug related to midair firing that I couldn't track down, so keep it in mind when trying to fire.
